name: The Milky Way Wars
description:
This game was made during a module in university. It was made using DirectX and C++.

Overview

Survive an onslaught of asteroids and enemies for as long as you can

in the latest battle in the Milky Way Wars by dodging them, shooting them

and using pickups to help you along the way.

What is the best high score you can get?

Pickups

Red - Health

Blue - Shield

Yellow - Speed boost

Controls

W - Move Up

A - Move Left

S - Move Right

D - Move Down

LEFT SHIFT - Move Forwards (Boost)

SPACE - Fire

ESC - Close Game

*Please allow the game to load when it is launched
